title: Lagoon Laundry POS
subTitle: POS system for a local laundry business.
description: Collaborated closely with the development team to integrate user feedback into subsequent releases, significantly improving usability and customer satisfaction. Conducted comprehensive user research to identify key functionalities and pain points, directly influencing the design specifications of the new POS system. Executed rigorous front-end testing to ensure the application's performance and reliability met end-user expectations and business requirements.

title: Portfolio Website
subTitle: A personal portfolio website.
description: This is my portfolio website that i did using React. It includes my skills, the works that i have done, my expereince and my education.

title: NutriWise
subTitle: A mobile health application for diabetics.
description: Designed and implemented the application's front-end using React and Expo, focusing on user-friendly navigation and clear data visualization to aid patients and healthcare providers. Developed a sophisticated glucose and insulin calculation system within the application to facilitate enhanced diabetes management for users. Led a team of five developers, managing project timelines, delegating tasks, and fostering a collaborative environment that drove the successful completion of a highly effective diabetes management tool.

title: Insurance Advertising
subTitle: AIA platinum wealth venture advertising for client
description: Designed and developed engaging advertising and promotional materials, including posters and digital assets, for the AIA Platinum Wealth Venture limited-time offer. Collaborated closely with the client to understand the campaign goals, ensuring the marketing materials accurately reflected the exclusive nature of the promotion. Managed tight deadlines to ensure timely delivery of all promotional materials, contributing to a successful marketing campaign that enhanced customer engagement and product visibility.

title: Bugger It!
subTitle: A website for people to hire reliable tradies.
description: Spearheaded the creation of comprehensive project documentation, including the development of detailed diagrams and workflows that guided the website's architecture and user interface design. Played a key role in ensuring project progression by meticulously tracking milestones and deliverables, which facilitated effective team collaboration and timely project execution. Contributed to the quality assurance process by reviewing and refining various features, enhancing the platform's functionality and user experience.

title: My Rent Buddy
subTitle: A page for people to rent cars.
description: This is a simple PHP website that allows users to rent cars. Our users will be able to view cars for rent, their rent history and current rents. Admins will be able to view a summary of cars rent history and current cars rented.

title: Pet Heaven
subTitle: A website for people to realease and adopt pets.
description: This is a individual project website that allow users to release and adopt pets. Our users will be hit with our strong advertising messages upon landing on our page. They will be able to view the pet catalogue and choose to fill in an adoption or release form.

title: AZoom Car Rental
subTitle: A website for people to rent cars.
description: This is a individual project website that allow users rent cars. Our users will be able to view available cars and rent them for a duration of time.
